description:
A user can explicitly set the 'key_name' value inside the 'server' dictionary when the extension is off and the data will be consume by the core api controller.

There should be a way for the core api controller to consume the value only if the ext is on.
title: Key Name can be injected when the keypairs extension is off

comments.content:
A user can explicitly set the 'key_name' value inside the 'server' dictionary when the extension is off and the data will be consume by the core api controller.

There should be a way for the core api controller to consume the value only if the ext is on.
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~iccha-sethi

comments.content:
Can you provide steps to reproduce this?

Thanks
chuck
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~zulcss

comments.content: This has already been implemented and merged few weeks back. Dont know why the bug is not linked and closed.
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~iccha-sethi
